question: Sayana, an important commentator on Vedas was associated with which among the following empires?
explanation: Sayana : was an important commentator on the Vedas. His commentary on the Rigveda was edited by Max MÃ¼ller, 1849-1875.He flourished under the king Bukka I and his successor Harihara II in the Vijayanagar Empire of South India.
